CloudEventHeaders.description: The header information of an event.

id.description: The unique id to identify an event.

specversion.description: The schema version of an event payload.

time.description: The time of the event. It should be in RFC format ('yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ').

dataschema.description: The schema of an event payload.

content-type.description: It is used to indicate the media type of the resource.

correlationid.description: The request id sent by NCMP as an acknowledgement.
